articles.content: It offers a new look at a unique art style

articles.title: Among Us Out Now On Nintendo Switch With Cross-Play - GameSpot
articles.description: The popular deception game surprised launched on the Switch eShop following this week's Indie World stream, and it features cross-play.
articles.content:
Nintendo closed out Tuesday's indie-focused video presentation
 with what was perhaps its biggest announcement of the day: The hit deception game Among Us is coming to Switch, and like a few other t… [+1910 chars]
